title: Sinbad: Mahou no Lamp to Ugoku Shima
synopsis: Sinbad and his friends run afoul of a storm while riding on the ship Bahal. Ali sights an island, which the ship heads toward to make repairs. Sinbad and Sana board a dinghy and land on the island. Sana sees a vision of a magical lamp, and Sinbad and the others set out to find it.
related_anime: ['Sinbad: Mahiru no Yoru to Fushigi no Mon', 'Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima']
voices: ['Tanabe, Momoko', 'Muranaka, Tomo', 'Aoyama, Yutaka', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Miyazawa, Tadashi', 'Kaga, Takeshi', 'Nagasawa, Nao']
staff: [['Miyashita, Shinpei', ['Director']], ['Hayafune, Kaeko', ['Script']], ['Satou, Yoshiharu', ['Character Design', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Kawasaki, Hiroyuki', ['Series Composition']]]
